inn1.comm: some extra bounce rightaway. It kicked up from back of length around the off stump line, Watson is surprised, yanks the bottom hand off the handle as he jabs it away to the off side
straighter, on the middle and off line, Watson gets behind the line to push it to the on side
goes back and across to punch the back-of-length delivery to point where Gambhir stops
lovely probing delivery cutting right across Watson who is squared-up, trying to defend, and is beaten
oh! mini-drama. The ball perhaps stopped a bit and kicked up on the middle and leg from short of length. Watson checked his jab and it went off the handle but falls well short of point
gets behind the line of this length delivery and cautiously pushes it out
lands it on a length around middle and off, shapes away towards the off stump, pushed out towards covers
slips this one down the leg side, perhaps going for the dream ball trying to get it swing from middle and leg ...
oh that middle and leg line, skids down to evade the waft and strikes the pad. Going down leg, though. PK doesn't even appeal. Dhoni was moving outside leg.
length delivery, width offered outside off, Paine doesn't put it away; hits it straight to covers .He must feel he has missed out two successive deliveries here
on the middle stump line, straightening a bit, Paine tries to work it to the on side but misses and the ball strikes him high on the pad
short in length, shaping away from the off stump, pushed out to the off side. Paine then practices hitting it straight in the V
shuffles across this time, picks the back-of-length delivery holding its line on the middle stump, and flicks it down to fine-leg region
short in length and bouncing outside off stump, Paine is too close to the line of the ball, is cramped up but manages to run it down to third man

Nehra takes out Watto. It was the bouncing delivery on the middle stump line, angling away towards off, Watson went for the pull but it's too weak a shot. the ball balloons towards Harbhajan at midwicket. Watson was troubled throughout the first over and looked to take the aggressive route this over but he is gone.
probing length delivery around the off and middle line, Paine goes right back to defend
around the off stump line, tapped close to the off side, Paine looks at Ponting who rushes forward and they get across comfortably
around the off and middle line, Ponting gets right behind the line to offer the dead bat
lunges out in his typical fashion, opens the bat-face to steer the ball to backward point
Again, Paine takes the single from the first ball with a dab to third man
lands back of length around off stump and shapes away, Ponting comes forward and shoulders the arms
stretches well forward to push the outswinger to the off-side of the pitch. Good positive stride forward from Ricky.
Almost caught and bowled. Ponting had stretched forward again and pushed at it, perhaps it stopped on him a touch, and the ball was in the air but falls short of the lunging PK
short of length, moves away from the off stump, left alone
on the middle stump line, worked to Harbhajan at midwicket. Ponting was saying to himself, "cmon cmon' while waiting for PK to release the ball
just outside leg stump, flicked away for a single. Again, Paine take a run first ball. Over to you Captain.

lovely slower one, full and just outside off stump, Ponting doesn't pick it until very late, takes the bottom-hand off the handle as he stumbles out forward. The ball runs off the outer edge to third man
goes right back to defend the length delivery to the off side
around 134 kmph length delivery angling away from Paine who deflects it down to third man for another single
goes back and across, almost in front of the off stump, and defends compactly out to covers.
Classy extra-cover drive. Wonderful foot work. He stretched well forward, leaning completely into the shot and caressed the ball through the off side.
good length delivery shaping towards the off stump, Paine leans forward to defend

Run out missed Paine had stabbed the ball behind the wicket and hesitated when Ponting called him over for a quick single. He then rushes across. Dhoni swooped on the ball and fired it towards the non-striker's end. PK (Praveen Kumar) wasn't at the stumps, he lunged out to collect but let the ball slip. Had he collected it cleanly or stood near the stumps, there could have been run out.
back of length, moving away from the stumps, steered to backward point
around 126 kmph, (That's around 78 mph) , short in length, holding its line outside off, punched to point

Shout for a catch or perhaps even lbw. Paine had jumped out of the crease, moving towards the off side and tried to whip a back-of-length delivery off his hips. The ball goes through to Dhoni who appeals and PK joins in. Too high if it was for lbw and no bat, I think, if it was for a catch.
full length delivery angling away from Ponting who steers it past backward point
bounces around the off stump, Paine waits before guiding it down to third man

loud shout for a catch down the leg side: It was a short of length delivery on the leg stump line, Ponting tries to play the leg glance and it appears to have gone off the hip. Dhoni lunged to his left to collect it. Replays not too conclusive
slightly slower, around 122 kmph, full in length and outside off stump, a surprised Ponting pushed at it and is beaten

hangs on the back foot and gets in trouble. he was initially looking to come forward before he went back and all that confused movement meant he didn't have much time. The ball clipped the inner edge and fell on his pads
angling away from Paine, who has this tendency to stay adjacent to the line of the ball and runs it down to third man.
drifts towards the pads and Paine plays the leg glance to the fine-leg boundary.
lands on short of length around the off stump, moves away, Paine opens the bat-face to steer it to point region
back of length, shapes in towards middle and off, Paine goes right back to defend it back down the pitch
slower one, fuller, on the middle and off line, pushed back to the bowler
quicker, skids on from the length, moves in towards middle and off line, evades the defensive poke and hits the pad high.
lovely probing delivery that moves away from off stump, Paine is rather hesitant in moving forward and stabs it off the outer edge to third man
walks out and towards the off side and Ishant pushes it wider outside off, punched to covers
lands it on the length, cuts it in towards middle, Paine is on the back foot, clipping it to the on side

133,5 kmph back of length delivery outside off stump, Paine reaches out for it and  in the end plays well away from the body. the bottom-hand came off the handle at the last minute but he went through with the uppish on the up square drive and clears point
fires in a short one and Paine rocks back to play a crunching pull over square-leg boundary. 10 runs so far in this over
a touch fuller, outside off stump, cut down to third man for a single.
pushes it way wide outside off stump.
What a lovely shot. It was back of length delivery well outside off stump, Ponting reached across, got close to the line of the ball and punched it sweetly on the up and through covers
fullish, on the middle, gets the bat around the front pad to push it to right of mid-on for a single
slips it down the leg side, keeps a bit low, Ponting doesn't connect with his clip shot and it bounces just before Dhoni who gets his pads in the way to stop it
Some Magic from Ricky. Delicious straight hit. He glided forward, picked the length delivery from the off and middle and lofted it handsomely over long-on.
shorter in length, on the middle and leg, Ponting had moved his front leg a bit too much across, twists his body, gets the bat around the pad to work the ball wide of midwicket
length delivery outside off stump, shaping away, Paine, who has dabbed similar deliveries to third man tries to repeat that shot but can't get it past backward point
on the middle stump line, Paine is right back as he defends to the on side
slightly slower, just outside off, from back of length, Paine stays back to steer this down to third man

Deep point in pace. Short and wide, Paine bottom-edges the cut behind the wicket. Dhoni reaches the ball and flings in a throw but Paine does well to run between the stumps and the throw and is hit on the body.
short in length and width on offer outside off stump, Ponting punches it to deep point
well outside off again but escapes punishment as Paine mistimes the forcing shot of the back foot and the ball rolls towards covers
short and wide again, slashed away well to the right of third man where Nehra puts in a gingerly dive to stop it
finally, the fuller length outside off stump, Paine jabs it away to the off side for a quickly-run single
neat little slower one, full and outside off stump, Ponting adjusts quickly on the move and quietly pushes it out to covers
flighted leg break on a length on the middle line, pushed back to him
slower, on a length, luring Paine forward before turning away; leading edge takes the ball to left of the bowler
turns from the middle and leg line, defended to the off side .. good bowling this
Edged but goes between Dhoni and Dravid at first slip. It was a lovely leg break that spun past the lunging Paine, took the edge and Dravid dived to his left but couldn't reach it.
leans forward to push it cautiously to the off side. Fine over this.
138.3 kmph length delivery well outside off and it keeps very low !  a surprised Ponting has a waft at it and the ball bounces before it reaches Dhoni
outside off stump, left alone
leans across to punch the length delivery through to deep point
Cheeky and aggressive. He walked down the track and to the off side, fetched the back of length delivery from outside off and swung it over midwicket.
Bosh. Paine picks the slower one very early and slams it through covers.
stays back to guide this one to backward point
low full toss on the off and middle, driven to long-on
reaches across outside off stump and paddles a full delivery very fine to pick up yet another boundary.
leans forward to defend to the on side

what a good delivery that. Spin and bounce. It broke back in sharply from outside off stump, bounced through the bat and pad gap , went past the off stump and bounded off Dhoni to the short fine-leg fielder
leans forward to defend this one

Aha! The reverse sweep has been unfurled. He fetched it from outside off and swept it to third man boundary. 50 up. Fine knock so far. This was a actually a good over from Harbhajan but Paine has been innovative and has picked two boundaries, courtesy a paddle sweep and a reverse sweep.
Dravid at slip watches Ponting lean forward to defend to covers
gets forward and across to glide the leg break past backward point for couple of runs. He just opened the bat-face to steer it
fuller, around the off stump, driven to long-off
goes back to work the ball from the off stump line to right of mid-on for a single
slightly short, Ponting punches it to covers
slower, bit more air, on a length around off, making the batsman stretch forward and Ponting jabs it out to the on side. Good delivery.
moves forward to whip it uppishly through mid-on, down to long-on for a single
lands it well outside off stump, making Ponting stretch across and Ponting gets the inside edge on the intended cover drive and the ball rolls to the leg side
on the off stump line, Ponting wrists it through the on side for a single

lands it short outside off, Paine's eyes must have lit up as he shaped dfor the big cut but is surprised by the big turn  and in the end , stabs it away. He then sports a big smile as he looks across at his partner
goes right back to defend to the on side
fuller, outside off stump, driven to left of Harbhajan who makes a half-stop
drops it slightly short on the middle and leg, turns in, Ponting pulls it away to deep square-leg region
stretches forward to sweep it very fine for couple of runs
slows up the pace, tosses it more, driven back to the bowler

Paine goes for another fine sweep but gets a top edge. He has profited from couple of sweeps and paddle sweeps but couldn't connect this one. It was flighted outside off stump line and Paine top edges a dolly to Harbhajan at midwicket. Paine was doing his role, trying to upset the lengths of the spinners with his various sweep, succeeded initially but couldn't get it working this time.
leans forward to defend to the off side
gets forward to drive to long-on and gets off the mark
goes right back to squeeze the top spinner behind square-leg
off break from well outside off stump, left alone
Now Ponting plays the paddle . He picked it from the middle stump line and paddled it with the turn
leans across to deflect the off break from outside off to midwicket
leans across to try play a little dab to the on side but the ball turns from around off stump and goes down leg
slower through the air, flighted off break on a length outside off stump, Ponting stretches well forward to play a very compact defensive stroke
goes on the back foot to punch the leg break to the off side and Mishra himself stops the ball
just outside off, doesn't turn in, sort of skids on, punched through the off side. It was released from the front of the hand ...palms facing the batsman
drags this one short and Hussey pulls it away to deep midwicket
leans forward to push  the leg break to extra cover
on the leg and middle line, glanced to fine-leg region
shifts his line to middle and off and Hussey respects that line with a solid defensive push
moves forward to drive the off break to covers
steps down the track to play an elegant off drive to long-off. 100 up. Solid start.
from round the stumps now , quickish, very full, on the middle and leg line, worked through midwicket
on the off stump line, pushed to short extra-cover region for a quick single
slows up the pace, full outside off stump, Ponting on drives it to Nehra at long-on
on the off stump line, full, steered to point for another single.
flighted leg break outside off, Hussey gets the inner edge on the off drive and the ball rolls to square-leg
turns sharply from the middle and off line, Ponting tries to dab it to backward point region but fails to connect
moves well forward to defend to the off side
leans forward to defend the leg break to left of Mishra
on the front foot, pushes the ball back to the bowler
ah! a tempting flighted leg break outside off stump, inviting Ponting to go for the big drive and he obliges but is beaten as the ball spins away from the blade
picks the ball from the middle and off line and paddles it away for a single
slower in the air, well outside off, turns in, Ponting lunges across to steer it to backward point
skips down the track to on drive it to long-on where Nehra stops
from round the stumps to lefty, on the middle, full in length, driven to long-on
moves down the track, is beaten in the flight and the slight shortening of the length but adjust quickly to use his wrists to chip it to wide long-on region
turns in from outside off, cut down to Sachin at backward point
really full in length, driven to Kohli at long-on
floats it outside off stump, Ponting forces it on the front foot but can't pierce the inner ring on the off side
moves down the track and on drives to long-on
almost a mix-up. It was flicked to square leg and set for a run and Ponting, wisely, sends him back. For the ball went straight to Harbhajan who fires in a throw and Hussey gets back in with a dive
flighted on the stumps, on driven for a single
moves down the track but is beaten in flight; he adjusts to lunge out to stab it bat and pad to the off side ..
from round the stumps, on the middle stump line, turned to midwicket
on the middle stump line, driven to long-on for yet another single
leans well forward to off drive to long-off
goes right back to nurdle the off break around the corner to backward square-leg for a single
quicker, flatter, on the off and middle line, Ponting stays back to work it well to the right of midwicket for a single
Swept away. It landed outside leg stump, from round the stumps, Hussey went down on his knee to sweep it really fine.

Risky Ricky! It was the googly, he must have picked it as went for the slog sweep but doesn't quite time it well .. it lands safely to left of deep midwicket where Gambhir does well to knock the ball away from the boundary
lovely leg break on the middle. Ponting was looking to dab it to the on side and gets a leading edge to covers
works this one to the on side for a single
Hussey goes for the reverse sweep and rotates the strike
Mishy! It landed on the middle and spun past a lunging Ponting, who looked to sweep it, and goes to Dhoni. Fine delivery.
slightly short, Ponting stays back to cut it to deep cover region
gets forward to push the ball to the on sdie
leans forward to on drive it to long-on
stays back to whip the off break from the middle stump line to long leg
moves forward to off drive to long-off
flatter, quicker, just outside off, dabbed towards backward point
from round the stumps, really full delivery, hussey had made up his mind to reverse sweep and reverse-paddles it to third man boundary
leans well across to punch a short-of-length delivery well outside off to deep point region
fuller in length, on the middle and leg, straightening, jabbed away to the on side.
drifts to the pads, tucked down to Nehra at fine-leg region
Ponting reaches his fifty with a cover drive. The dressing room applauds and the crowd too give him  a generous hand.
full and around the off stump line, dragged off the inner half of the bat to the on side. Hussey then practices playing the off drive
Ishant is making effort to hurl the ball fuller in this spell but has overpitched this one. Hussey creams it superbly to the straight boundary, past Ishant, past the stumps and past the umpire.
length ball, just outside off, pushed to cover
legcutter, pitches off, holds its line, defended back
looks to work it to leg, early into the shot, luckily for him the leading edge falls safe
back of a length, angling in, worked away to deep midwicket
short and wide, rocks back, cuts it late and places it perfectly - neither third man nor sweeper cover has a chance
slower ball, waits for it and runs it down to third man
full ball, looks to drive to cover, but gets the inside half of the bat and gets one to long-off
length ball, wide outside off, drives it with an open face, on the rise, but can't beat point
overpitched, driven down to long-off for one
short and on the pads, pulled away to fine leg
another overpitched delivery, driven crunchily, but he finds short cover
lunges forward and pushes it down to long-off for a single
Dhoni is standing up to the stumps. length delivery straightening on the middle and off, jabbed to point region
keeps low outside off, Hussey can't connect, Dhoni can't stop (it bounced awkwardly in front of him) and they take a bye
on the leg and middle line, brushes the thigh pad and Dhoni makes a half-stop
drops it short and Ricky pulls it hard but straight to deep midwicket
drifts down leg side, Hussey tries to flick, misses and Dhoni collects
short in length outside off cut to Mishra at deep point region
on a length, m oving in towards middle stump, deflected to midwicket
length delivery well outside off, driven to Gambhir at sweeper cover

Classy again. Top shot. No violence. Pure timing. It wasn't a bad ball - short in length just outside off, Ponting comes forward, opens the bat-face and punches his steer shot to backward point boundary.
reaches out to drive on the up but takes out the bottom hand off the bat as the ball, perhaps, stopped on him a bit and the ball rolls to the off side
length delivery on the middle and off line, run down to third man
width offered outside off stump, slammed away to deep cover
full in length, moving in towards off stump,  driven to cover
on the middle, worked to Harbhajan at midwicket. Dhoni is again standing up to the stumps
back of length on the middle and leg, glanced to fine-leg where Ishant rushes across and releases the throw quickly
short in length, on the middle and leg, worked past square-leg for a single
ooh ... beaten by a slower one  Ponting was trying to dab it to the on side, checked his stroke and the ball was in the air but falls safely on the leg side
works this one through the on side for a single
too short and Hussey pulls it to right of Gambhir at deep midwicket
outside off stump, back of length, guided to PK at third man
comes forward to stab the ball off bat and pad to the off side
drops this short and Hussey pulls it to right of fine-leg where Harbhajan moves quickly to stop it
bangs it in short, Ponting checks the pull shot and gets the ball to deep backward square-leg for a single

Ponting is run out. Again Hussey and Ponting involved in a run out. It was Flintoff then, it is Gambhir this time. Hussey drove it to left of sweeper cover and immediately called out two. Both ran as hard as they could but Gambhir rushed to his left, picked the ball and fired in a direct hit from the deep at the non-striker's end. Even if it wasn't a direct hit, Ponting was likely to get out. What a big wicket. What a way for Ponting to go. He was looking so good out there.
reaches his fifty this time with an on drive towards mid-on. Good busy little innings.
from round the stump,s flighted , driven hard but can't beat short extra-cover
slower, on the middle, goes on straight, defended on the front foot
goes right back to dab it through midwicket for a single
flighted off break that lands outside off, White leans across to dab it the on side and is hit on the pad
slightly short, punched down to long-on
flighted on the middle and off line, pushed towards long-on for a single ..
well outside off stump, cut hard but can't beat Kohli at backward point
length delivery homing in on the off stump, tapped to point region for a single
slants it across Cameron who shoulders arms
length delivery on the off stump line, pushed out to cover point for a single
short in length, slower one, cut down to third man for a single
fires across a bouncer, White is late on the pull and jabs it down to leg side and the ball rolls towards square-leg
turns in from outside off, White goes back to dab it to midwicket
arm-ball from round the stumps, skids on towards middle, pushed out to the on side
pushes it wide down the leg side,
Fab! White leaned forward, picked the flighted delivery from outside off and lifted it high over mid-off .. one bounc and over the boundary
flighted on the middle and leg, flicked away to deep square-leg region ..
Harbhajan switched to round the stumps previous ball. He stays round the wicket, delivers this on middle and leg, nudged to the on side for a single
stays back to pick a single to backward square-leg
fullish, outside off, driven to mid-off
on a length around the off stump line, guided to cover point for a single
full toss on the leg stump line, fine-leg was inside the circle, and Hussey laps it past the fielder.
length delivery homing in on the off stump, pushed to point for a single
slower one, angling across White who picks it late, tries to punch it to the off side but is beaten
short in length, punched really hard to left of backward point where Virat Kohli flies to make fine half stop
Good whippy on drive there. It was full and on the middle and leg, whipped through wide midwicket . it wasn't the leg break, was the front-of-the hand skidder
googly outside off stump, driven to long-off
low dipping full toss, flicked away for a single
really full in length, just outside off, driven to Raina at extra cover
the big spinning leg break, White goes for the sweep, misses and Dhoni gathers
googly from outside off, White leans across to defend it down the track
worked to deep square-leg
slightly slower on the off and middle, nudged to point region for a single
fullish, on the middle, tilting in, driven to long-on
slower one outside off stump, cut down to backward point where Kohli, who made such a fine stop in the last over, fumbles
length delivery moving towards middle and off, steered to left of Kohli for a single
skips down the track, Nehra shortens the length a bit, worked through midwicket
on the leg and middle, stabbed away to short fine-leg region
from wide of the crease, full and outside off stump, driven to long-off
turns down leg, slightly short in length, pulled to Nehra at deep backward square-leg
quicker, turns away from the off stump, dabbed away to backward point
skids on just outside leg, Hussey misses the flick and Dhoni collects
googly around the off and middle, pushed out to covers
Bang! squeezed out full on the middle stump line, White goes down on his knee to slog sweep it high and way over midwicket boundary.
holes out to long-off. It was full and well outside off stump, Hussey reached out to lift it straight to Sachin. Lucky break for Ishant. Hussey walks back after a fine knock
full in length, 129 kmph, driven to long-off
slips to the legs, flicked away for a single
slower one, dipping in front of the middle, almost on the boot, defended to the on side
leans forward to punch a short-of-length delivery to the right of the diving Kohli for a single
full in length around the off stump, steered to Kohli
stays back to push the off break to midwicket
fullish, on the off stump line, driven to Nehra at long-on
dips in on a length on the off stump line, worked through to long-on
moves outside leg before moving back to his original position and pushes this ball through point
slows up the pace , on the middle, nurdled to short fine-leg
leans forward to push it to midwicket
leans forward to drive down to long-on
short in length, bouncing outside off, holding its line, steered to backward point
walks down the track, Ishant bangs it in shorter, pushed out to covers
